gfm.description: Escape pipes (|, for tables), colons (:, for literal URLs), tildes (~, for strike-through).

commonmark.description: Compile adjacent blockquotes separately and escape more characters using slashes, instead of as entities.

oneOf.description: Entities are generated for special HTML characters (& > &) and non-ASCII characters (© > ©). If named entities are not (widely) supported, numbered character references are used (’ > ’).
Numbered entities are generated (& > &) for special HTML characters and non-ASCII characters.
Special HTML characters are encoded (& > &, ’ > ’), non-ASCII characters not (ö persists).

setext.description: Compile headings, when possible, in Setext-style: using = for level one headings and - for level two headings. Other heading levels are compiled as ATX (respecting closeAtx).

closeAtx.description: Compile ATX headings with the same amount of closing hashes as opening hashes.

looseTable.description: Create tables without fences (initial and final pipes).

spacedTable.description: Create tables without spacing between pipes and content.

fence.description: Fence marker to use for code blocks.

fences.description: Stringify code blocks without language with fences.

listItemIndent.description: How to indent the content from list items.

oneOf.description: use one space for tight and tab for loose list items.

incrementListMarker.description: Whether to increment ordered list item bullets.

rule.description: Marker to use for thematic breaks (horizontal rules).

ruleRepetition.description: Number of markers to use for thematic breaks (horizontal rules). Should be 3 or more.

ruleSpace.description: Whether to pad thematic break (horizontal rule) markers with spaces.
